LineComment.Text: Local part management - variable can be either wstring OR array of char
If array of char, the array pass through a filter to delete empty positions
Copy all positions of char array
Set the index of last valid char
Convert the array of char in string
Copy only the right amount of data
When there are more than one station at the machine, the _STn is concatenated to the PLC_ID
Send pre defined data to DMC to test the communication and declaration
